alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 9:01AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...SLIPPERY SPOTS ON ROADS AND AREAS OF FOG WILL IMPACT TRAVEL THROUGH THIS MORNING... Patchy freezing drizzle across northern Minnesota and northwest Wisconsin has led to a few slippery spots on roads this morning. In addition, areas of fog may freeze on cold roads this morning, adding to the slick conditions. Slick spots on roads and reduced visibilities will result in locally hazardous travel conditions. Motorists should use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach their destination this morning. The slippery conditions are most likely to be found on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Don`t use cruise control. Be especially careful around stop lights, school bus stops, and intersections. Check road conditions... By Phone: call 511 Website for Wisconsin: 511wi.gov Website for Minnesota: 511mn.org
